body.p: Replace the admin, password1, 10.4.2.4, and remote1 values in the above example with your actual values.
This will send a request similar to the following example:

codeblock.codeph: DELETE /pools/default/remoteClusters/remote1 HTTP/1.1 Authorization: Basic QWRtaW5pc3RyYXRvcjpwYXNzd29yZDE= User-Agent: curl/7.21.4 (universal-apple-darwin11.0) libcurl/7.21.4 OpenSSL/0.9.8r zlib/1.2.5 Host: 10.4.2.4:8091 Accept: */*

body.p: If successful, Couchbase Server will respond with a 200 response as well as the string, ‘OK’:

codeblock.codeph:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: Couchbase Server 2.0.0-1941-rel-community Pragma: no-cache
....
"ok"
